channel.title: Posts on user.exe
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on user.exe

item.title: How my website works
item.description: I’ve been meaning to do this post for a while, so here it is. The base site The site itself is made with hugo. It’s a really cool static site generator that lets me write posts in markdown. I write my post, plop it in /content/posts/whatever.md, run hugo, and the site gets built into /public in less than a second. I can even run hugo serve --navigateToChanged and it will host my site on localhost port 1313, rebuilding every time I save a file, and redirect my already open window to whatever page was saved last.

item.title: My Problem with Apple
item.description: Note This post is not ment as “Apple should go to hell”, it’s an explination for “why don’t you like Apple”. There’s a lot of stuff that Apple does do a good job on - have you seen the M1 Ultra? - but that is not this post. There’s also other stuff I don’t like but this is the big ones. Apple stuff only works with other Apple stuff Apple has made itself the Apple ecosystem.

item.title: Locked out of my Discord
item.description: Info I got back in. Thanks dad! So Discord locked me out. I was just going about my buisness, then I’m hit with a page that just says “something is going on here”. It forces me to verify a phone number. The only phone numbers I have are landline or VOIP. Which conveniently, Discord doesn’t allow for phone numbers. I’ll be off Discord until I can sort this out. The support team is garbage - stop taking away a large chunk of people’s lives, Discord!

item.title: Privacy on userexe.me
item.description: Warning This page is not a privacy policy. I’m not making any commitments, this might be out-of-date without notice. I wanted to make this post instead of just a boring hard to understand privacy policy. This post outlines what data I get about you, and what I do with it. Spoiler: not much. üç™ Cookies Probobly the biggest concern that poeple have right off the bat, ohno i don’t like the browser flavor of cookies.

item.title: Sign Language is HARD
item.description: So for school we have to learn sign language, and it’s quite difficult. Like very. I think. We’re using this site called sign school, which tries to make it “fun” but it’s kinda disturbing. Here’s an example: click click click me I’m not sure what it is I just want to see if my rss feed works lol

item.title: Initial Performance Tests
item.description: Took some performance tests from Google’s “Lighthouse” and thought I would share them in the first sorta actual post on this site. Mobile: click me Desktop: click me too
